articles.title: Colorado's top court disqualified Trump - will the Supreme Court overrule? - BBC.com
articles.description: The nine justices of America's highest court are set to take centre stage in a politically fraught case.
articles.content:
By Brandon DrenonBBC News, Washington
The ruling from Colorado's top court that Donald Trump cannot appear on the state's ballot as a Republican presidential candidate is now almost certain to end u… [+7529 chars]

articles.title: Dreaming of a white Christmas? Try Alaska. Meanwhile, some US ski areas struggle with rain - The Associated Press
articles.description: For most Americans dreaming of a white Christmas, this year’s prospects aren’t good. Although parts of the Rockies and Midwest already have snow or could get a fresh dusting by Monday, other parts of the country that are normally coated in white by this time …
